features: Excellent Comfort-Strategically designed coccyx cutout floats your tailbone so even those with sacrum sensitivities can sit for long periods without discomfort. The desk chair cushion distributes weight evenly and provides support where you need it most

Gel Construction Polyfoam / gel infused foam seat cushion-Covered in breathable mesh that can be removed for easy washing, the cushion features a cooling gel infused high dense foam that effortlessly conforms to your body’s shape.
SEAT RISER works with any chair and is made of durable, lightweight, high density foam that contours to the body by reducing pressure on the back and tailbone by avoiding compression

Security and protetion. To improve the safety of users in the wheelchair for daily activities,Our team designed a non-slip bottom,it prevents it from moving around, even when you shift in your wheelchair or scooter.
Size to fit any chiar.The CYLEN gel foam cushion (18" x 17" x 3") fits most wheelchairs , it can turn seats of scooter, office chair, car seat, and dining chair into comfortable seats also.

MEMORY FOAM COMFORT: Two Layers Provide Superior Comfort: Memory Foam Upper Layer. 1. The top layer of the foam cushion features plush memory foam for comfort and excellent pressure prevention. 2. Medical Grade Foam Core - a high density core layer supports the memory foam to ensure just the right firmness and support.
body.description: foam cushion features plush memory foam for comfort and excellent pressure prevention. 2. Medical Grade Foam Core - a high density core layer supports the memory foam to ensure just the right firmness and support. Cylen Gel infused high dense Polyfoam Wheelchair Seat Cushion The supportive seat cushion adds comfort and height to wheelchairs, regular chairs, car seats or even hard benches. Specifically designed to fit most wheelchairs but can be used whenever you want some extra padding on your chair. The gel foam is high density meaning it won’t flatten easily and will stay strong use after use. It’s also great for use in your car or when you need a seat cushion for special events. The cushion is super lightweight, so you can easily transport it from place to place or while traveling. The cover is removable and machine washable, though we recommend you wash it alone first to avoid color bleeding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable!!!!! Perfect for drivers!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product for my husband. He drives heavy machinery in the log yard at his work and was having trouble with his back from driving through pot holes and bouncing around on a hard seat all day. He would come home in so much pain. But this cushion has literally done wonders he says it so comfortable and really helps with his back pain. So if you drive trucks or heavy machinery all day and have back issue definitely buy this!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great cushion for the most part
reviews.reviewText: My only complaint is that after a while (2-3 hrs) of sitting I can feel pressure on my tailbone due to my size and weight (250lbs) flattening the cushion. I think I would have liked it better if it was shaped to a butt instead of just a regular rectangle. Or if there was a space for the tailbone, like a little divot. When I use other cushions with it, to keep pressure off of my tailbone, it works great. Can sit longer with no pain in my tailbone. I also, wish that there was some form of material on the bottom of the pad so it would not be so slippery. Seems like I am always adjusting due to the pad slipping out of my seat. The material is strong that covers the pad unlike other pads I have used and has not ripped even with my kids grabbing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This 3 inch thick pillow is good to cushion a transport chair, a wheelchair, or to use at a place where the seats are not comfortable.It doesn’t have straps, just a carry handle. The outer cover has a thin zipper so it can be removed for washing.It arrives wrapped tightly so you’ll have to let it naturally unfold and regain shape for a few hours. Not sure if it’s waterproof because I didn’t pour anything on it. It can fit in the washer or dryer if it gets wet or needs washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOPE... not as thick as youd think
reviews.reviewText: instead of 15 minutes in my office chair before my butt falls asleep now with this i get 20... its not as thick or cushy as you would think - sending it back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and perfect
reviews.reviewText: Using this amazing cushion for my husband's wheelchair. It fits his wheelchair perfectly and is very comfortable. It is lightweight so easy for us to move as needed. I highly recommend this cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent portable cushion
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite portable cushion, as its very light, but yet still comfortable and giving, and has a handy handle sewn in....so you can always pick it up and grab it. These two things make it extremely easy to move around with it, as I use it as a cushion to throw onto the floor when I want to sit on the floor, as a cushion for my knees if I am kneeling on the floor, and for my walker thing with wheels if I have to sit on that for a while. As its so versatile, light, and with the handle..its so easy to use it for all of those things, and probably many more. Wheras some other cusions I tried were bulky, heavier at over twice the weight at 3-5 pounds, and usually do not have a handle on them...so those are NOT...at all easily portable and more of a burden trying to move them around. Whereas this one...solves that problem completely.As for feel its extremely comfortable. It feels like sitting on a cloud compared to the hard floor, or my hard walker seat. Surprisingly comfortable for how light it is and yet gives you enough cushioning and I feel totally comfortable sitting and kneeling on it. In sum, if you want one of the lightest, but yet most comfortable and most portable seat cushions...get this cushion.

reviews.reviewerName: Here in Eugene, OregonHere in Eugene, Oregon
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a dense 3" cushion with a handle
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this cushion for a new ergonomic office chair I felt was quite comfortable except for its only 'relatively comfortable' seat cushion. (note: the product page showed this cushion on an ergonomic office chair)Unfortunately, this 3" cushion turned a comfortable ergonomic office chair into a decidedly uncomfortable experience by changing the dynamics and ergonomics of the chair itself. The lumbar and back support didn't feel right at all with the addition of the thicker cushion. (I should have seen that coming).The cushion itself arrived folded and rolled inside a protective sleeve and plastic bag. Once laid out, it took quite a few hours for the dense foam to achieve a flat surface again without a hump in the middle. But once it did, its breathable cover fit snuggly and is attractive.The double stitched handle is a real plus. And is real handy for a 'grab and go cushion' for those games on bleachers.Although the surface material and substrata breathe, the dense foam feels warm to me after sitting for a while. And, I don't like sitting on the surface material in shorts as it feels a bit scratchy. My partner found himself adjusting his clothes several times before getting more comfortable because the material pulled at his clothes as he sunk in.That said, the cushion is very comfortable on flat, or only slightly padded surfaces.CONCLUSION: I'm happy with the cushion, but not for the intended purpose. It will be good on meditation retreats, bleachers, the front bench, or sitting in a straight back chair working on a project for hours. And I have a short friend that can use it to elevate herself at the table when she visits for a more comfortable game of cards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My sister loves this!
reviews.reviewText: This pad was ordered as a gift for my sister who is in a wheelchair when she's not in her bed. She needed a new pad and this fit perfectly. There are different sizes of wheelchair, so be careful. This won't work for a small chair, so look for a different size if that's what you need.The pad is very soft and the foam returns to shape quickly.
